dict.acceptation: [语]一致，符合；商定，约定；意见相合；（气候、食物等）适宜；
同意，承认；使和谐一致；认为正确无误；

sent.orig: If feel irrespective agree, feel to cannot agree, this is this principle, do not agree.
sent.trans: 如果觉得没关系就同意，觉得不能同意，这是自己的原则，就不同意。

sent.orig: Do you agree to go with us if we agree to lend you some cash?
sent.trans: 假如咱们答应借钱给你，你同意和咱们一起去吗？

sent.orig: By joining and clicking at site you agree to terms and agree to our payout system.
sent.trans: 参加并点击网站，在您同意的条款并同意我们的奖金制度。

sent.orig: Is it because they agree or because they are afraid not to agree?
sent.trans: 这是因为他们赞同还是他们害怕不赞同的后果？

sent.orig: Do you agree to go with us if we agree to lend you some money?
sent.trans: 如果我们答应借钱给你，你同意和我们一起去吗？
